column_description: The unique identifier of the payment.
Timestamp of when a record was last synced.
Boolean identifiying whether the record was deleted in the source.
The id of the Zuora account associated with the payment.
The accounting code associated with the payment.
The amount of the payment in the transaction currency.
The amount of the payment in the home currency.
The amount of the payment that has been applied to one or more invoices.
The amount of the payment that has been applied to a credit balance.
The id of the contact to which the payment should be billed.
The date the payment was cancelled.
A comment associated with the payment.
The id of the user who created the payment.
The date the payment was created.
The currency of the payment.
The date the payment will be effective.
The exchange rate used to convert the payment amount from the transaction currency to the home currency.
The date the exchange rate was set.
The home currency of the payment.
The id of the parent account associated with the payment.
The id of the payment method used for the payment.
The payment number assigned by Zuora.
The amount of the payment that has been refunded.
The date the payment was settled.
The id of the contact who made the payment.
The status of the payment.
The date the payment was submitted.
The transaction currency of the payment.
Whether the payment has been transferred to the accounting system.
The type of the payment.
The amount of the payment that has not yet been applied.
The id of the user who last updated the payment.
The date the payment was last updated.
